text: Hello! Yeah I'm kinda trying to aim for big ones but starting at smaller studios is perfect for me as well to kickstart my career. A lot of people say that to me so I definitely agree with you.

In regards to company culture, it sounds really nice and I would like to work in an environment where you're having fun and helping each other. It can be one of the reasons why I want to go to work everyday. It's the people and the atmosphere, well of course I get money to hehe! :smile:
Have you ever considered moving to a different company (maybe bigger studios) or do you still prefer working at smaller studios?

Lastly, regarding about my reel, early next week is perfect for me and I hope it's perfect to you too. It's all good to me and I'm in no rush or anything! I do really appreciate your time looking at my work and giving CC!
P.S. Just a quick question, what made you do Groom? I just wanted to know a bit more if that's ok with you :smile:
